name: T. Dean Hendrix
content: Home | Dean Hendrix Home Teaching COMP 2210 ENGR 1110 Research jGRASP Studio Based Learning Links CSSE COE AU Dean Hendrix I am an Associate Professor in the department of Computer Science and Software Engineering in the Samuel Ginn College of Engineering at Auburn University. My research focuses primarily on software visualization and how it can be applied to both computing education and software engineering. I teach courses in computing fundamentals, software engineering, and cloud computing. I also coordinate the curricula, assessment, and accreditation of our department's three undergraduate programs. Contact Information Dr. Dean Hendrix, Ph.D. Associate Professor Computer Science and Software Engineering Suite 3101 Shelby Center Auburn University, AL 36849-5347 Voice: 334-844-6305 Fax: 334-844-6329 Email: hendrtd at auburn dot e d u Copyright Â© 2010, Dean Hendrix.
